room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: My husband and I did two rooms (Hostage & Museum Heist) we had a different game master each time and they both were really great. Both rooms were super fun but we loved the Museum Heist the most. Definitely fun if youâ€™re near by this is a great place to stop!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: My kids (13,7) and I did the museum heist today. We all had a blast! First time for us all and we can't wait to go back and do another one! Monica was our host and she did a perfect job! She was there for us when needed and gave just enough of a hint to keep our minds going in the right direction. Well done breakout! Thanks again Monica!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: We did the Museum Heist room yesterday, and let me tell you - as someone who has done their fair share of escape rooms (in four different cities!) this was one of the best. We had a great time, our Game Master Kim was outstanding and fun, and we came out of there chatting about all the awesome elements of the room for the next half hour. I would go back here in a heartbeat. Nice job! And thanks, Kim!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: My team and I went for "team building " and really enjoyed ourselves. We missed the mark by 30 seconds in solving the mystery in the Museum Heist! Looking forward to returning to solve other games.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Our party of 6, friends and family did the museum heist. This is our second time and our second place to escape as a group. Well thought out and a lot of fun. Made it out with a little time to spare.
